label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_027
content:
## 2024-09-28 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 12005780
- Unique source IPs: 1243
- Unique destination IPs: 4296
- Average flow duration (sec): 27.9
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 78.9
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 15.0
- ICMP percentage: 1.2
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 169
- East-West traffic percentage: 64.6

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 2441141
- Unique domains: 42221
- NXDOMAIN responses: 11860
- DGA suspected domains: 2
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 1584
- Average response time (ms): 2.3
- Cache hit percentage: 93.8
- TXT record queries: 524
- PTR queries: 6029

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 632
- Blocked by IPS: 92
- Signature matches: 699
- Anomaly detections: 39
- Severity critical: 0
- Severity high: 17
- Severity medium: 49
- Severity low: 418
- Top signatures:
  - ET MALWARE CnC Beacon Activity
  - ET POLICY SMB2 NT Create File
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
- False positive rate percentage: 12.8

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 5.16
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 2.86
- WAN peak (Gbps): 7.84
- LAN core utilization percentage: 51.3
- DMZ utilization percentage: 27.3
- VPN concentrator sessions: 249
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 1.61
- Top talker IP: 10.42.112.25
- Top talker bytes (GB): 38.8

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 1
- Prefix withdrawals: 0
- AS path changes: 0
- Route flaps: 2
- Peer sessions established: 4
- Peer sessions down: 1
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 3
- New entries for organization domains: 5
- Suspicious issuances: 1
- Expired certificates in use: 1
- TLS 1.0 connections: 14
- TLS 1.1 connections: 11
- TLS 1.2 connections: 62252
- TLS 1.3 connections: 173844
- Weak cipher usage: 2

### Infrastructure
- Netflow-collector-01:
  - CPU percentage: 53
  - Memory percentage: 70
  - Disk percentage: 60
- Dns-resolver-01:
  - CPU percentage: 26
  - Memory percentage: 49
  - Cache size (GB): 2.2
- Ids-sensor-01:
  - CPU percentage: 44
  - Memory percentage: 57
  - Packets per second: 125091
- Ids-sensor-02:
  - CPU percentage: 48
  - Memory percentage: 64
  - Packets per second: 123471
- Border-router-01:
  - CPU percentage: 29
  - Memory percentage: 31
  - Interface errors: 1

### Events
- CT log alert: new certificate for api.company.com issued by Lets Encrypt — verified as authorized
- IDS signature ET WEB_SERVER tuned: added exception for scanner
- BGP route change: new peer session with IX — documented

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-28. 12005780 flows analyzed. 2441141 DNS queries. 632 IDS alerts (0 critical, 17 high). WAN avg 5.16/2.86 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
